title: Spinach and Ricotta Ham Rolls
ingredients: ['8 large slices ham', '250g ricotta cheese', '185ml soured cream', '1 egg, lightly beaten', '1 small onion, finely chopped', '100g cooked, well drained spinach', '1 pinch nutmeg', '1 pinch dry mustard powder', 'salt and pepper to taste', '250ml cream of mushroom soup', '4 tablespoons soured cream']
